subclusters.subcluster_name: Neuro-Oxidative Stress and Cognitive Decline Theory
Genetic Regulation of Antioxidant Defense Theory

theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mitochondrial ROS production causing oxidative damage to mtDNA and mitochondrial function decline leading to aging.
Emphasizes mitochondrial ROS generation and imbalance with antioxidant defenses causing aging.
Highlights p66Shc mitochondrial redox enzyme producing ROS and its impact on lifespan and aging.
Focuses on mtDNA damage by mitochondrial ROS causing bioenergetic decline and aging.
Links mitochondrial ROS generation rates and cytochrome c oxidase activity to lifespan and aging.
Describes oxidative damage accumulation from mitochondrial ROS and its role in aging rate and patterns.
Connects metabolic rate, mitochondrial ROS production, antioxidant defenses, and longevity.
Focuses on ROS accumulation from oxidative phosphorylation and antioxidant defense modulation of aging.
Discusses ROS from metabolism causing oxidative damage and individual variation in antioxidant repair.
Describes ROS generation from metabolism, lipid oxidative damage accumulation, and dietary modulation.
General oxidative damage from ROS imbalance and antioxidant protection influencing aging and diseases.
Emphasizes endogenous ROS damage and antioxidant defense correlation with lifespan in naked mole rat.
Focuses on oxidative damage to macromolecules by ROS and antioxidant enzyme roles in aging.
Describes age-related increase in ROS, decline in antioxidant defenses, and redox potential shift.
Details ROS generation as metabolic byproduct causing selective protein oxidation and brain aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Neuro-Oxidative Stress and Cognitive Decline Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on oxidative damage accumulation in brain macromolecules causing cognitive impairment.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Neuro-Oxidative Stress and Cognitive Decline Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights brain susceptibility to ROS damage and antioxidant defense impact on brain aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Neuro-Oxidative Stress and Cognitive Decline Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes oxidative stress in ovarian microenvironment causing oocyte aging and infertility.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Neuro-Oxidative Stress and Cognitive Decline Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links oxidative stress to increased astrocyte GFAP expression and brain aging processes.
Focuses on oxidative stress causing premature cellular senescence in chondrocytes leading to osteoarthritis.
Describes oxidative DNA damage accumulation triggering irreversible cellular senescence and aging.
Links oxidative stress to DNA repair inhibition and accumulation of DNA damage driving aging.
Focuses on oxidative DNA damage accumulation in tissues and caloric restriction reducing damage.
Proposes oxidative injury impairs oxygen uptake in liver cells causing metabolic decline with age.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes longevity determinant genes regulating antioxidant defenses and resistance to oxidative damage.
